9#define TAG "ViewPort"

11_Static_assert(ViewPortOrientationMAX == 4, "Incorrect ViewPortOrientation count");
12_Static_assert(
13 (ViewPortOrientationHorizontal == 0 && ViewPortOrientationHorizontalFlip == 1 &&
14 ViewPortOrientationVertical == 2 && ViewPortOrientationVerticalFlip == 3),
15 "Incorrect ViewPortOrientation order");
16_Static_assert(InputKeyMAX == 6, "Incorrect InputKey count");
17_Static_assert(
18 (InputKeyUp == 0 && InputKeyDown == 1 && InputKeyRight == 2 && InputKeyLeft == 3 &&
19 InputKeyOk == 4 && InputKeyBack == 5),
20 "Incorrect InputKey order");
21
25static const InputKey view_port_input_mapping[ViewPortOrientationMAX][InputKeyMAX] = {
26 {InputKeyUp,
27 InputKeyDown,
28 InputKeyRight,
29 InputKeyLeft,
30 InputKeyOk,
31 InputKeyBack}, //ViewPortOrientationHorizontal
32 {InputKeyDown,
33 InputKeyUp,
34 InputKeyLeft,
35 InputKeyRight,
36 InputKeyOk,
37 InputKeyBack}, //ViewPortOrientationHorizontalFlip
38 {InputKeyRight,
39 InputKeyLeft,
40 InputKeyDown,
41 InputKeyUp,
42 InputKeyOk,
43 InputKeyBack}, //ViewPortOrientationVertical
44 {InputKeyLeft,
45 InputKeyRight,
46 InputKeyUp,
47 InputKeyDown,
48 InputKeyOk,
49 InputKeyBack}, //ViewPortOrientationVerticalFlip
50};
51
52static const InputKey view_port_left_hand_input_mapping[InputKeyMAX] =
53 {InputKeyDown, InputKeyUp, InputKeyLeft, InputKeyRight, InputKeyOk, InputKeyBack};
54
55static const CanvasOrientation view_port_orientation_mapping[ViewPortOrientationMAX] = {
56 [ViewPortOrientationHorizontal] = CanvasOrientationHorizontal,
57 [ViewPortOrientationHorizontalFlip] = CanvasOrientationHorizontalFlip,
58 [ViewPortOrientationVertical] = CanvasOrientationVertical,
59 [ViewPortOrientationVerticalFlip] = CanvasOrientationVerticalFlip,
60};
61
62// Remaps directional pad buttons on Flipper based on ViewPort orientation
63static void view_port_map_input(InputEvent* event, ViewPortOrientation orientation) {
64 furi_assert(orientation < ViewPortOrientationMAX && event->key < InputKeyMAX);
65
66 if(event->sequence_source != INPUT_SEQUENCE_SOURCE_HARDWARE) {
67 return;
68 }
69
70 if(orientation == ViewPortOrientationHorizontal ||
71 orientation == ViewPortOrientationHorizontalFlip) {
72 if(furi_hal_rtc_is_flag_set(FuriHalRtcFlagHandOrient)) {
73 event->key = view_port_left_hand_input_mapping[event->key];
74 }
75 }
76 event->key = view_port_input_mapping[orientation][event->key];
77}
78
79static void view_port_setup_canvas_orientation(const ViewPort* view_port, Canvas* canvas) {
80 CanvasOrientation orientation = view_port_orientation_mapping[view_port->orientation];
81
82 if(furi_hal_rtc_is_flag_set(FuriHalRtcFlagHandOrient)) {
83 if(orientation == CanvasOrientationHorizontal) {
84 orientation = CanvasOrientationHorizontalFlip;
85 } else if(orientation == CanvasOrientationHorizontalFlip) {
86 orientation = CanvasOrientationHorizontal;
87 }
88 }
89
90 canvas_set_orientation(canvas, orientation);
91}
92
93ViewPort* view_port_alloc() {
94 ViewPort* view_port = malloc(sizeof(ViewPort));
95 view_port->orientation = ViewPortOrientationHorizontal;
96 view_port->is_enabled = true;
97 view_port->mutex = furi_mutex_alloc(FuriMutexTypeRecursive);
98 return view_port;
99}
100
101void view_port_free(ViewPort* view_port) {
102 furi_assert(view_port);
103 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
104 furi_check(view_port->gui == NULL);
105 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
106 furi_mutex_free(view_port->mutex);
107 free(view_port);
108}

110void view_port_set_width(ViewPort* view_port, uint8_t width) {
111 furi_assert(view_port);
112 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
113 view_port->width = width;
114 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
115}

117uint8_t view_port_get_width(const ViewPort* view_port) {
118 furi_assert(view_port);
119 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
120 uint8_t width = view_port->width;
121 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
122 return width;
123}

139
140void view_port_enabled_set(ViewPort* view_port, bool enabled) {
141 furi_assert(view_port);
142 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
143 if(view_port->is_enabled != enabled) {
144 view_port->is_enabled = enabled;
145 if(view_port->gui) gui_update(view_port->gui);
146 }
147 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
148}
149
150bool view_port_is_enabled(const ViewPort* view_port) {
151 furi_assert(view_port);
152 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
153 bool is_enabled = view_port->is_enabled;
154 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
155 return is_enabled;
156}

159 furi_assert(view_port);
160 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
161 view_port->draw_callback = callback;
162 view_port->draw_callback_context = context;
163 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
164}

167 ViewPort* view_port,
168 ViewPortInputCallback callback,
169 void* context) {
170 furi_assert(view_port);
171 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
172 view_port->input_callback = callback;
173 view_port->input_callback_context = context;
174 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);

176
177void view_port_update(ViewPort* view_port) {
178 furi_assert(view_port);
179
180 // We are not going to lockup system, but will notify you instead
181 // Make sure that you don't call viewport methods inside of another mutex, especially one that is used in draw call
182 if(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, 2) != FuriStatusOk) {
183 FURI_LOG_W(TAG, "ViewPort lockup: see %s:%d", __FILE__, __LINE__ - 3);
184 }
185
186 if(view_port->gui && view_port->is_enabled) gui_update(view_port->gui);
187 furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex);
188}
189
190void view_port_gui_set(ViewPort* view_port, Gui* gui) {
191 furi_assert(view_port);
192 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
193 view_port->gui = gui;
194 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
195}
196
197void view_port_draw(ViewPort* view_port, Canvas* canvas) {
198 furi_assert(view_port);
199 furi_assert(canvas);
200
201 // We are not going to lockup system, but will notify you instead
202 // Make sure that you don't call viewport methods inside of another mutex, especially one that is used in draw call
203 if(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, 2) != FuriStatusOk) {
204 FURI_LOG_W(TAG, "ViewPort lockup: see %s:%d", __FILE__, __LINE__ - 3);
205 }
206
207 furi_check(view_port->gui);
208
209 if(view_port->draw_callback) {
210 view_port_setup_canvas_orientation(view_port, canvas);
211 view_port->draw_callback(canvas, view_port->draw_callback_context);
212 }
213
214 furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex);
215}
216
217void view_port_input(ViewPort* view_port, InputEvent* event) {
218 furi_assert(view_port);
219 furi_assert(event);
220 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
221 furi_check(view_port->gui);
222
223 if(view_port->input_callback) {
224 ViewPortOrientation orientation = view_port_get_orientation(view_port);
225 view_port_map_input(event, orientation);
226 view_port->input_callback(event, view_port->input_callback_context);
227 }
228 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
229}
230
231void view_port_set_orientation(ViewPort* view_port, ViewPortOrientation orientation) {
232 furi_assert(view_port);
233 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
234 view_port->orientation = orientation;
235 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
236}
237
238ViewPortOrientation view_port_get_orientation(const ViewPort* view_port) {
239 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(view_port->mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
240 ViewPortOrientation orientation = view_port->orientation;
241 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(view_port->mutex) == FuriStatusOk);
242 return orientation;
243}
